exp.libs.algorithm._3rd.hash
类 Heap

java.lang.Object
  exp.libs.algorithm._3rd.hash.Node
      exp.libs.algorithm._3rd.hash.Heap

public class Heap
extends Node

The Heap class provides the utilities to draw a complete binary tree on the corresponding graphical context. It also contains some animation methods used in heap sort, priority queue and sorting using priority queue

There are basically 4 types of graphical objects: input, output, tree representation of heap, and array representation of heap. The Node class is used to store the graphical objects.

另请参见：
Node

构造方法详细信息

Heap

public Heap(DrawingPanel drawingPanel,
            int max_size)
Create a new heap and pre-calculate the location of each node given the maximum number of node passed in as the parameter.

参数：
drawingPanel - The drawing panel where the heap is to be drawn.
max_size - The maximum number of nodes in the heap.
方法详细信息

redraw

public void redraw()
Repaints the drawing panel and delay.

initHeap

public void initHeap()
Re-initialize the heap. This method is called when the animation is re-started.

setInput

public void setInput(int[] a)
Set the input objects based on the array of weight given by the parameter.

参数：
a - Array of weights for the input objects

addInput

public void addInput(int i)
Adds an input object with the weight specified by the parameter.

参数：
i - Weight of the additional input object.

delFirstInput

public void delFirstInput()
Remove the first input object.

addOutput

public void addOutput(int i)
Remove an object from each of the tree and array representation of the heap and adds an object to the output object list.

This method involves an animation which merge the root of the heap tree and the first object of the heap array and move the resultant object to the output position.

参数：
i - The weight of the output object added.

moveLast2First

public void moveLast2First()
Move the last object of the heap to the first/root (for both tree and array representation). The movement is also animated.

restore

public void restore(int i)
Restore/remove highlight for the node in the heap (both tree and array representation.

参数：
i - The node to be restore.

highlight

public void highlight(int i)
Highlight a node on the heap tree and its correspondence on the array representation.

参数：
i - The node to be highlighted.

exchangeArrow

public void exchangeArrow(int i,
                          int j)
Shows arrow from node i to node j and the other way round (animation) to indicate that these two nodes are going to be exchanged.

参数：
i - Parent node to be swapped.
j - Child node to be swapped.

input2heap

public void input2heap()
Remove the first object from the input object list and animate its movement to the heap, i.e. it splits into two, one to the array representation and the other to the tree representation of the heap.

setHeap

public void setHeap(int[] a)
Re-assign the heap using the array of weights passed in as the parameter.

参数：
a - Array of weight for the newly re-assigned heap.

heapSize

public int heapSize()
Returns the number of nodes in the heap.

返回：
The heap size.

setNode

public void setNode(int i,
                    int val)
Re-assign the weight of node i according to the parameters.

参数：
i - The node, which weight is going to be re-assigned.
val - The new weight to be set.

power

public int power(int num,
                 int pow)
Performs the exponent of num to the power of pow.

参数：
num - Base.
pow - Exponent.

parent

public int parent(int i)
参数：
i - The node, whose parent is of interest.
返回：
The position of the parent of node i.

left

public int left(int i)
Returns the left child of node i.

right

public int right(int i)
Returns the right child of node i.

drawTree

public void drawTree(Graphics g)
Draws all graphical objects within this class.

参数：
g - Graphical context.

drawArrow

public void drawArrow(Graphics g,
                      Point[] points)
Draw an arrowed line segment using the array of points.

参数：
g - Graphical context
points - The vortices of the line segment. An arrow head will be drawn using the last point in the array at the tip.

treeWidth

public int treeWidth(Node node)
参数：
node - The root node of the tree
返回：
The width of the tree in the number of pixels.

leftMostPosn

public int leftMostPosn(Node node)
参数：
node - The root node of the tree
返回：
The left most position of the tree

rightMostPosn

public int rightMostPosn(Node node)
参数：
node - The root node of the tree
返回：
The right most position of the tree

treeHeight

public int treeHeight(Node node)
参数：
node - The root node of the tree
返回：
The height of the tree in the number of pixels.

bottomMostPosn

public int bottomMostPosn(Node node)
参数：
node - The root node of the tree
返回：
The bottom most position of the tree

drawLeafNode

public void drawLeafNode(Graphics g,
                         Node node)
Drawing a leaf node of the heap.

参数：
g - Graphical context
node - The node to be drawn

drawArrayNode

public void drawArrayNode(Graphics g,
                          int x,
                          int y,
                          Node node)
Draw a node of the array representation of the heap.

参数：
g - Graphical context
x - The x coordinate of the top left corner of the node
y - The y coordinate of the top left corner of the node
node - The node to be drawn

drawNode

public void drawNode(Graphics g,
                     Node node)
Drawing a node based on the input parameters.

参数：
g - Graphical context
node - The node to be drawn

moveNode

public void moveNode(Node node,
                     int dx,
                     int dy)
Move the tree starting with node dx pixels to the right and dy pixels down.

参数：
node - The root node of the tree to be moved.
dx - The change in x direction.
dy - The change in y direction.
